item.title: Citadel 聘请苹果公司顶级招聘主管担任新人事主管
item.description: 据知情人士透露，苹果公司的招聘高管即将离职，前往投资公司 Citadel 担任首席人事官，这标志着这家 iPhone 制造商动荡的人力资源团队又一次重大离职。【原文：Apple Inc.’s top recruiting executive is leaving to become the chief people officer at investment firm Citadel, according to people with knowledge of the matter, marking another major departure for the iPhone maker’s tumultuous human resources team.】

item.title: 赛诺菲将于本周末与 CD&R 公司签署消费者保健协议
item.description: 据知情人士透露，赛诺菲将于本周末签署一项协议，将其消费者保健业务的控制权出售给 Clayton Dubilier & Rice 公司，在此之前，竞争对手曾试图破坏这一交易。【原文：Sanofi is aiming to sign an agreement this weekend to sell control of its consumer health business to Clayton Dubilier & Rice, following a last-ditch attempt by a rival bidder to derail the deal, people with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 美国最繁忙的贸易枢纽第三季度货物吞吐量打破大流行病记录
item.description: 美国最繁忙的集装箱集散地继续保持着接近创纪录的进口量，因为企业要在潜在的关税上调之前将货物运入，并避免在其他港口受到飓风和劳动力的干扰。【原文：The busiest container complex in the US continues to churn through near-record import volumes as businesses bring goods in ahead of potential tariff increases and avoid hurricane and labor disruptions at alternate ports.】

item.title: 随着 Ken Leech 调查的深入，司法部对 Wamco 客户进行了询问
item.description: 随着美国当局加大对曾经的明星交易员肯-利奇（Ken Leech）如何分配获胜赌注的调查力度，使用西方资产管理公司（Western Asset Management Co.【原文：Money managers that used Western Asset Management Co. to help invest their bond portfolios are being pressed about their dealings with the firm, as US authorities ramp up their investigation of how once-star trader Ken Leech allocated winning bets.】

item.title: 古巴因发电厂故障和燃料短缺而大面积停电
item.description: 古巴的主要发电厂发生故障后，整个古巴都停电了，政府为了节省燃料，对主要行业进行了控制。【原文：Electricity went out across the entirety of Cuba after the island’s main power plant failed and the government throttled key industries in an effort to save fuel.】

item.title: 加拿大原油输往阿拉斯加，新输油管道改变出口格局
item.description: 由于最近扩建的跨山管道开辟了新的出口机会，一油轮加拿大原油至少十年来首次从温哥华运往阿拉斯加。【原文：A tanker of Canadian crude was shipped from Vancouver to Alaska for the first time in at least 10 years as the recently expanded Trans Mountain pipeline opens up new export opportunities.】

item.title: 拜州美国公司在法院托管下进行破产出售
item.description: 法院指定的受托人表示，破产的印度科技公司 Byju's 几年前以 8.2 亿美元收购的三家美国教育软件公司将被出售，以偿还贷款人的债务。【原文：Three US education-software companies that bankrupt Indian tech-firm Byju’s bought for $820 million just a few years ago will be put up for sale in order to repay lenders, a court-appointed trustee said.】

item.title: 对于想要重新抵押贷款的人来说，时机不对
item.description: 大家好，欢迎阅读《奇点》时事通讯，它是来自《奇点》世界的每日内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. Sometimes it's us, Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway, bringing you our thoughts on the most recent developments in markets, finance and the economy. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.title: 比特币在创下新高后重新向 70,000 美元挺进
item.description: 比特币在五天内第四次攀升，投机者在数字资产日益繁荣的背景下，再次瞄准了 7 万美元的目标。【原文：Bitcoin climbed for the fourth time in five days, with speculators targeting $70,000 once again amid growing exuberance for digital assets.】

item.title: 病毒式传播的新独立视频游戏《山楂树》有着悲惨的背景故事
item.description:
尽管他们的游戏在 Steam 上被许愿列出了 112,000 多次，Near Studios 的独立创作者们仍在寻找资金

。【原文：

Despite their game being wish-listed more than 112,000 times on Steam, the indie creators at Near Studios are still searching for funding

】

item.title: 绕过霍尔木兹海峡的伊朗油港正在加满油
item.description: 伊朗为绕过重要的霍尔木兹海峡而建造的一个石油码头似乎已经装满了部分原油；这为德黑兰提供了一种不使用该水道而向世界输送少量石油的手段。【原文：An oil terminal Iran built to bypass the vital strait of Hormuz appears to have partially filled with crude — offering Tehran a means to get a little of its oil into the world without using the waterway.】

item.title: 刚果国家矿业公司竞标 Trafigura 支持的钴项目
item.description: 刚果民主共和国国有矿业公司已提交了一份对 Chemaf Resources Ltd. 在该国的部门的竞标书，几个月前，该公司曾表示打算阻止此前将这家铜钴矿业公司出售给一家中国投资者的交易。【原文：Democratic Republic of Congo’s state-owned miner has submitted a bid for Chemaf Resources Ltd.’s unit in the country, months after saying it intended to block a previous deal to sell the copper and cobalt miner to a Chinese investor.】

item.title: 航空股从夏季飙升失败中复苏，创 2022 年新高
item.description: 创纪录的夏季旅游旺季未能让投资者对航空公司感到兴奋，但令人鼓舞的盈利开端，以及削减国内运力增长以更密切配合需求的计划，正在为该行业的前景带来光明。【原文：A record-breaking summer travel season failed to get investors excited about airlines, but an encouraging start to earnings, along with plans to dial back domestic capacity growth to more closely match demand, is brightening the outlook for the sector.】

item.title: 让美国官员忧心忡忡的简单选举黑客策略
item.description: 是什么让选举官员夜不能寐？提示：不是篡改选票。但首先...【原文：What keeps election officials awake at night? Hint: it’s not vote tampering. But first…】

item.title: 贝莱德寻求在加密衍生品市场占据更大份额
item.description: 随着华尔街公司深入数字资产市场，贝莱德公司正在推动其货币市场数字硬币更广泛地用作加密货币衍生品交易的抵押品。【原文：BlackRock Inc. is pushing to have its money-market digital coin more widely used as collateral for crypto derivatives trades, as Wall Street firms push deeper into digital asset markets.】

item.title: 银行盈利强劲，推动股市突破 2023 年水平
item.description: 虽然经历了漫长的艰难攀升，但好于预期的财报季正推动银行股回到自 2023 年地区银行业危机之前从未见过的水平，这表明投资者终于重拾了对金融业的信心。【原文：It’s been a long hard climb, but a better-than-expected earnings season is propelling bank stocks back to levels not seen since before the 2023 regional banking crisis, signaling that investors have finally regained confidence in the finance industry.】

item.title: 荷兰政府出台措施限制量子技术出口
item.description: 荷兰政府宣布，如果公司想在欧盟以外销售量子计算机，将需要出口许可证。【原文：The Dutch government announced that companies will need an export permit if they want to sell quantum computers outside the European Union.】

item.title: 人工智能初创企业 SandboxAQ 寻求估值超过 50 亿美元的融资
item.description: 据知情人士透露，从 Alphabet 公司分离出来的创业公司 SandboxAQ 正在寻求以超过 50 亿美元的估值筹集新的股权融资。【原文：SandboxAQ, a startup spun off from Alphabet Inc., is seeking to raise new equity funding at a valuation of more than $5 billion, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: CME 在争夺美国国债主导权的战役中求助于耶伦
item.description: 芝加哥商品交易所集团正在加紧争夺美国国债期货的市场份额，使出浑身解数阻挠霍华德-卢特尼克（Howard Lutnick）推出在伦敦清算的竞争对手合约的计划。【原文：CME Group Inc. is amping up the battle for market share in US Treasury futures, pulling all stops to thwart Howard Lutnick’s plan to launch rival contracts that clear in London.】

item.title: 摩根大通向巴拿马贷款 10 亿美元，帮助其填补预算缺口
item.description: 根据官方公报上公布的一项决议，摩根大通公司将向巴拿马提供 10 亿美元贷款，帮助其满足 2024 年预算的流动性需求。【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co. is lending Panama $1 billion to help it with liquidity needs for its 2024 budget, according to a resolution published in the official gazette.】

item.title: 新泽西州交通局在公共汽车销售激增中筹资 32 亿美元
item.description: 新泽西州一家为道路、桥梁和公共交通基础设施提供资金的机构，也加入了市政发行人在 11 月 5 日美国大选前急于筹集资金而掀起的债务狂潮。【原文：A New Jersey agency that finances road, bridge and mass transit infrastructure, joined the debt spree spurred by municipal issuers rushing to raise cash before the Nov. 5 US election.】

item.title: 人工智能检测器误导学生作弊—后果严重
item.description:
约三分之二的教师表示经常使用工具来检测人工智能生成的内容。在这种规模下，即使是微小的错误率也会迅速增加。【原文：

About two-thirds of teachers report regularly using tools for detecting AI-generated content. At that scale, even tiny error rates can add up quickly.

】

item.title: 宝马因火灾安全风险在中国召回近 70 万辆汽车
item.description: 由于冷却液泵存在缺陷，宝马汽车公司将在中国召回近 70 万辆汽车。【原文：BMW AG is recalling nearly 700,000 vehicles in China due to coolant pump defects, a fresh setback for the German carmaker that’s reeling from other vehicle faults.】

item.title: 印度在私营企业的帮助下奔向太空
item.description:
在彭博社原创系列Momentum的首播节目中，Haslinda Amin揭示了太空革命背后的私营公司网络。【原文：

On the premiere episode of the Bloomberg Originals series Momentum, Haslinda Amin reveals the network of private firms behind a space revolution.

】

item.title: 泽连斯基称白宫团队将访问基辅讨论计划
item.description: 乌克兰总统沃洛德梅尔-泽连斯基（Volodymyr Zelenskiy）说，美国白宫团队不久将访问乌克兰，就他的所谓 "胜利计划 "提供反馈意见，该计划概述了他结束俄罗斯入侵的愿景。【原文：Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskiy says the US White House team will soon visit Ukraine to provide feedback on his so-called “victory plan” that outlines his vision for ending Russia’s invasion.】

item.title: 美国银行预计 2025 年小额贷款销售额将达到创纪录的 5200 亿美元
item.description: 市政债券市场最大承销商的策略师们预测，国家和地方政府债务银行家们今年将非常忙碌。【原文：Strategists at the municipal-bond market’s biggest underwriter are forecasting a very busy year for state and local government debt bankers.】

item.title: 危机四伏的玻利维亚突然成为令人惊喜的债券投资机会
item.description: 玻利维亚的美元债券飙升至一年来的最高点，原因是 KNG Securities 对该债券持积极态度，而且前总统埃沃-莫拉莱斯面临法律挑战，这降低了他在这个危机四伏的国家重新掌权的可能性。【原文：Bolivia’s dollar bonds have soared to the highest in a year as KNG Securities turned positive on the notes and former president Evo Morales faced legal challenges, reducing his chances of returning to power in the crisis-ridden nation.】

item.title: 道达尔能源公司不会急于实施浮动风力发电项目，即使法国也在推进该项目
item.description: 道达尔能源公司（TotalEnergies SE）首席执行官帕特里克-普瓦纳（Patrick Pouyanne）表示，该能源巨头并不急于开发大型、昂贵的浮动风力发电场，而法国政府刚刚公布了推进这一新兴技术的计划，以帮助实现其净零排放目标。【原文：TotalEnergies SE Chief Executive Officer Patrick Pouyanne said the energy giant is in no rush to develop large, expensive floating wind farms, just as the French government unveiled plans to press ahead with the nascent technology to help reach its net zero ambitions.】

item.title: 千禧年 100 亿美元融资吸引 200 亿美元资金
item.description: 伊兹-英格兰德（Izzy Englander）的千禧年管理公司（Millennium Management）旨在为其对冲基金筹集多达 100 亿美元的新资金。事实证明，投资者想要的资金是这个数额的两倍。【原文：Izzy Englander’s Millennium Management aimed to raise as much as $10 billion of new capital for its hedge fund. It turns out investors wanted to fork over twice that amount.】

item.title: 哈里斯的居家护理计划被视为 Addus 等股票的提振因素
item.description: 紧接着美国副总统卡马拉-哈里斯（Kamala Harris）概述了她的计划，即如果她成为总统，将覆盖居家养老护理，华尔街分析师预测，与该业务相关的公司将从她的提议中受益。【原文：Hot on the heels of US Vice President Kamala Harris outlining her plan to cover in-home senior care if she becomes president, Wall Street analysts are predicting that companies involved with the business will benefit from her proposal.】
